text: Rebecca Enonchong (born 14 July 1967) is an Anglophone Cameroonian technology businesswoman and the creator and CEO of AppsTech. She is best known for her work in promoting technology in Africa. Ms Enonchong has received several awards from organisations such as the World Economic Forum. Forbes ranked her as one of the 10 tech founders to watch in Africa in 2014. Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:African businesspeople Category:Cameroonian people
title: Rebecca Enonchong
